title: Area of one room for installation of telephone concentrators as per requirements of Mahanagar Telephone Nigam limited
clause_text: Area of one room for installation of telephone concentrators as per requirements of Mahanagar Telephone Nigam limited. Letter box room as specified in Regulation No 37(10) (a).
section: The following shall be counted in FSI.
